DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety , tolerability , bioactivity , dose response two different dosage ( 0.5 mg 2.0 mg ) ranibizumab ( RBZ ) patient diabetic macular edema ( DME ) .
DOC.brief_title: Ranibizumab Edema Macula Diabetes : Protocol 3 With High Dose - READ 3 Study
